paper_abstract: This paper analyzes, on the basis of methods of the mathematical kinetic theory of active particles, some complexity problems related to the evolution of reciprocal feelings. Specifically, the analysis is focused on the complexity problems generated by triple interactions, with respect to simple binary encounters. Complexity refers not only to the structure of the equation, but also to the variable describing reciprocal feelings. (c) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the complexity of multiple interactions with additional reasonings about Kate, Jules and Jim
